function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate prediction of outbreak","Impact":"Delayed response and increased transmission","Mitigation":"Improved predictive analytics and real-time data monitoring","Technologies":"Big data and advanced analytics","People":"Public health authorities, governments","Owner":"Data scientists, epidemiologists"},{"Description":"Inaccurate detection and diagnosis of infected patients","Impact":"Uncontrolled spread of the virus","Mitigation":"Enhanced diagnostic tools and rapid testing methods","Technologies":"AI, digital diagnostics","People":"Infected individuals, public health authorities","Owner":"Medical technologists, public health officials"},{"Description":"Insufficient anticipation of critical cases","Impact":"Overwhelmed healthcare systems and increased mortality","Mitigation":"Predictive models for patient outcomes and resource planning","Technologies":"Big data, predictive modeling","People":"Healthcare providers, patients","Owner":"Data analysts, healthcare administrators"}]}
